# 阿尔法之路1.0 - 安迪

## 下载

### Docker

```
docker pull apachecn0/aerfa-zhilu-ver1
docker run -tid -p <port>:80 apachecn0/aerfa-zhilu-ver1
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```

### PYPI

```
pip install aerfa-zhilu-ver1
aerfa-zhilu-ver1 <port>
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```

### NPM

```
npm install -g aerfa-zhilu-ver1
aerfa-zhilu-ver1 <port>
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```
